title: Something unexpected happened while trying to create your lobby...
body:
I get the above notification every time I attempt to join any queue that has a draft pick selection..

Blind pick works but the others wont let me in,

I tried full repair, update to the latest patch & client patch 

Restarted multiple times the PC...

Any suggestions? 

{{summoner:7}}

replies.body: When you enter queue, your connection is transitioning from pvpnet to champion select.  Your network might be blocking you from entering champion select, and resulting in that error.  You should run through each step in this [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Test it out in a custom game to be sure it worked.  Let me know if you have any questions!
